programme.desc: The burning body of an aspiring writer and director crash-lands onto a passing car; Bones seeks guidance on the meaning of passion in the workplace; Booth allows Aubrey to take the reins on their current case.

programme.desc: Extensive plastic surgery hides the identity of a body whose parts were found near an airport.

programme.desc: Rachel, a diplomatic consul, passes out on a street in Mexico City after a night of drinking. She is rescued by Alejandro, a single father whose visa she rejected the day before, and sparks fly between the two.

programme.title: Mean Girls 2
programme.desc: After a clique of girls makes life difficult, a new student (Meaghan Martin) forms a rival group to take control of the school's corridors.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 1970s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Following in his father's (Chevy Chase) footsteps, Rusty Griswold (Ed Helms) takes his wife (Christina Applegate) and two sons on a cross-country road trip to America's favorite fun park, Walley World.

programme.title: XXX: State of the Union
programme.desc: In Washington, D.C., the new XXX agent (Ice Cube) must eliminate a threat to the president from within the U.S. government.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.title: Slice
programme.desc: In a spooky small town, when a slew of pizza delivery boys are slain on the job, two daring survivors set out to catch the culprits behind the cryptic crime spree.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Psychic Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) reluctantly agrees to use her ability to converse with the dead to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who is being tormented by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: A Prayer Before Dawn
programme.desc: The amazing true story of Billy Moore, an English boxer incarcerated in Thailand's most notorious prison. Thrown into a world of drugs and violence, he finds his best chance to escape is to fight his way out in Muay Thai tournaments.

programme.title: The Company You Keep
programme.desc: After a reporter (Shia LaBeouf) uncovers his real identity, a former Weather Underground activist (Robert Redford) goes on the run to track down his former lover (Julie Christie), a fellow member of his cell who never gave up the fight.

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: Held captive for years in an enclosed space, a woman (Brie Larson) and her young son (Jacob Tremblay) finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.title: XXX

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate

programme.title: Al rojo vivo
programme.desc: La revista noticiosa que define la agenda de la televisión en español en EE. UU. Se caracteriza por ofrecer, antes que nadie, historias que cautivan al público hispano y por presentarlas en un formato innovador que resalta el aspecto humano.

programme.title: Hoy día
programme.desc: El show de las mañanas que ofrece más entretenimiento y diversión, con contenido positivo, útil e inspirador, pero sin dejar de lado los titulares y noticias que la comunidad hispana en Estados Unidos necesita para comenzar el día bien informada.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: La doctora Ana María Polo interviene en batallas legales que afectan a los latinos. Como en una corte, las partes presentan testigos y evidencias para que ella emita su decisión. Además, expertos contribuyen con sus conocimientos.

programme.title: La impostora

programme.title: Corazón valiente
programme.desc: Dos fuertes mujeres encabezan una inolvidable historia de lealtad, amistad, coraje y amor. Ángela y Samantha son amigas de la infancia que se encuentran cuidando las vidas de otros como guardaespaldas.

programme.desc: Silvia le ocultó, durante 24 años, a su hija quién era su verdadero padre, ahora ella no le perdona su mentira. La joven, decepcionada, no atiende el teléfono, mucho menos acepta volver a casa.
